entries.context: Description
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm
Two Factory workers stand outside during a smoke break.
entries.sourceEnglish: Maybe we should get back to work now?
I can't afford to lose this job...
Mme. Derriere has been hinting that she's going to automate every department!
She's obsessed with efficiency—so can we go now?!
If we worked in Slaughter or Shipping, sure, maybe we could be replaced.
You can't replace Animal Handling. It's an ART.
You say that, but I bet Mme. Derriere's already building Robots to go pick up donkeys instead of us.
When was the last time you saw a Robot?
Uh... I dunno. The Forklift's automated now, doesn't that count?
There's a difference between a Machine and a Robot, idiot.
What about the self-locking cages in the Holding Facilities?
What are you talking about? We don't have self-locking cages.

entries.context: Description

Description
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm
Branch 1.1. The group went to the Circus and Sad Ass stayed on the Farm.
Jump to line 11.
entries.sourceEnglish: @#$%&! We're NOT AT THE CIRCUS ANYMORE!

entries.context: Branch 1.2. The group went to the Circus with Sad Ass.
Jump to line 11.
entries.sourceEnglish: We're not at the Circus anymore...

entries.context: Branch 1.3. The group went to the Zoo.
entries.sourceEnglish: Is it Monday? Are we starting Ass of the Week?!

entries.context: Jump to line 11.
entries.sourceEnglish: @#$%&! We're NOT AT THE ZOO ANYMORE!

entries.context: Branches (1.1, 1.2, 1.3) converge.

entries.sourceEnglish: Slow Ass wasn't in the Truck-Machine when we got here—
Big Ass has gotta be around here somewhere.

entries.context: Dialogue option 1. Jump to line 19.
entries.sourceEnglish: Maybe he's still stuck in the Truck-Machine.

entries.context: Dialogue option 2. Jump to line 19.
entries.sourceEnglish: Maybe he couldn't fit in this cage.

entries.context: Dialogue option 3. Jump to line 19.
entries.sourceEnglish: Maybe the Humans mistook him for a Horse.

entries.context: All dialogue options from 3 previous lines converge.

entries.sourceEnglish: Don't bother looking for your friend.
I came here with my Herd.
We used to work in the mountains carrying books to school children.
Now I'm the only one of us left.
ONE. We break out of this cage.
TWO. We go find Big Ass.
THREE. We get out of this Factory alive and—I'll tell you the rest later!
Hey, it was unlocked—Step ONE complete!

entries.context: Said to either ONE donkey or TWO donkeys. If necessary adapt sentence to avoid Singular / Plural variations in target language.
entries.sourceEnglish: Stay here while I find us a way out.

entries.context: Once reaching the final gate and leaving the room.

entries.sourceEnglish: No one who goes through that door ever comes back....

entries.context: Random NPC lines.
Random NPC lines.
entries.sourceEnglish: It sure helps to have other people looking out for you... will you do the same for me?

entries.context: Random NPC lines.
entries.sourceEnglish: I saw a Human come in and fiddle with that thing on the wall over there.

entries.context: Random NPC lines.
Random NPC lines.
entries.sourceEnglish: Please, do you have any food?

entries.context: Random NPC lines.
entries.sourceEnglish: WAAAHH!! I... just want to go home!

entries.context: Random NPC lines.
entries.sourceEnglish: There's only one way out of this place... in a box.

entries.context: Random NPC lines.
entries.sourceEnglish: I tried to run from the Humans... but they tracked me down and locked me up.

entries.sourceEnglish: Psst! How did you get out? Are you here to save us?!
We're looking for someone named Big Ass—you seen him?
No, but I did see a hefty fellow being taken to the next room.
But, whatever you do, don't let those cameras see you.
I got us out of the last room, it's your turn Kick Ass.

entries.context: Camera zoom into Smart Ass's mind.
Upon completion of the map.
Random NPC lines.
entries.sourceEnglish: You and your friends aren't going to make it out of here alive.

entries.context: Random NPC lines.
Random NPC lines.
entries.sourceEnglish: I can't find my partner!! Where is he?!

entries.context: Random NPC lines.
entries.sourceEnglish: What did I do to deserve this?!

entries.context: Random NPC lines.
entries.sourceEnglish: You're lucky, you still have some of your Herd. For now.

entries.sourceEnglish: Pardon me! Is this a jailbreak?
We're looking for someone named Big—you seen him?\n
Big? Oh dear, perhaps that was the Ass of impressive mass that was just taken into the Slaughterhouse chamber.
Never fear, we have a provision of shared responsibility for singing the Song of Ascension for the Asses who go before us.
You just don't want to be the final Ass of the night...
We gotta find Big Ass QUICK!
Of course, if you come across any Humans, you might be wise to give them a right good knock on the skull.
It's your life or theirs after all.
A good knock, just like old times.
You made me promise to never HURT HUMANS AGAIN!
It's time for a new strategy...

entries.context: Camera zoom into Smart Ass's mind.
Upon completion of the map.
Random NPC lines.
Random NPC lines.
entries.sourceEnglish: And then Kick will knock out...

entries.context: Random NPC lines.
entries.sourceEnglish: If I see a Human, I'll beat them down!

entries.context: Random NPC lines.
entries.sourceEnglish: What's going to happen to me?!

entries.context: Random NPC lines.
entries.sourceEnglish: If you see my partner Left, tell him I have always loved him dearly.

entries.context: Random NPC lines.
entries.sourceEnglish: Will you sing for me when I'm gone?

Big Ass is picked up by the same hook as the worker and taken into the next room.

A loud sound from the machine—the worker is being sliced and diced. Big is next.

entries.sourceEnglish: We've got to turn off this Death-Machine.

entries.context: This is said if Sad is not present.
Alternately, this is said if Sad is present.
The machine is stopped now.

entries.sourceEnglish: I truly thought that was the end for me.

entries.context: Dialogue option 1.1.
This is said if Sad is present. Jump to line 21.
Dialogue option 1.2.
This is said if Sad is present.
Jump to line 21.
The Asses can now head towards the exit for this level.
entries.sourceEnglish: Step THREE! We all get out alive!

entries.context: Optional dialogue when interacting with the radio.

entries.sourceEnglish: Congratulations, the new automated Forklifts have been increasing efficiency by 15%.
Retirement parties for Forklift Operators will be held in the Break Room from 13h00-13h05.

The Asses find themselves in a big freezer with countless carcasses.
This dialogue happens if Sad is present.

entries.sourceEnglish: Wait. We should sing the Song of Ascension for our Comrades before we leave.
Big—from the look of these carcasses... We're too late.
Back on that hook, my life flashed before my eyes.
I've never fit in anywhere, or made much of an impact.
But, I want to make a difference now.
Even if we're too late, we should try.
If it means one more Soul makes it to the Astral Plane, it's worth it.

entries.context: Branch 1.1. If came from Circus without Sad.
Jump to line 18.
Branch 1.2. If came from Circus with Sad.
Jump to line 18.
Branch 1.3. If came from Zoo without Sad.
Jump to line 18.

The branch options (1.1, 1.2, 1.3) converge. 
The Asses sing the Song of Ascension.
entries.sourceEnglish: {color=yellow}{s=5}♪  hee haw hi hon 'ee ah he a'w ♪{/color}

entries.context: The Asses head off towards one of two rooms: Meat Processing or Boiling.
Check the miro! These are still in the game
entries.sourceEnglish: Come on, we should keep going.

entries.context: Check the miro! These are still in the game
Check the miro! These are still in the game
Check the miro! These are still in the game
entries.sourceEnglish: You know... it wouldn't hurt to try...

entries.context: Check the miro! These are still in the game
entries.sourceEnglish: It'd be nice to sing it together.

entries.sourceEnglish: Time for the Ace Strategist to show everyone how it's done!

entries.sourceEnglish: Are they melting the skin of the deceased in here?

entries.sourceEnglish: There are switches and Humans in front of the gates.
We'll go in pairs. Kick and Big will work together...

entries.sourceEnglish: Come on. We have to be getting close to an exit!
We're going to need to think outside the box.

One of the final levels in the Factory. The Asses jump off the conveyor belt and are on opposite sides of a big wall.

entries.sourceEnglish: What are you doing over there?!
We JUMPED! Just like YOU SAID!
We're going to have to work like a Team...

entries.context: Camera zoom into Smart's mind.
The Asses leave the stage one-at-a-time.

Description
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm
The Asses are in a hallway close to the exit.

entries.sourceEnglish: I'm getting all of us out of here alive!
What about freeing the other Asses?
Aren't they part of your Plan?
A Plan that includes trying to save us AND free hundreds of other Asses is impossible.
And what will we do after that?
{vpunch=100,1}I want to know NOW, Smart Ass.

entries.context: Jump to line 15 or line 17.
entries.sourceEnglish: After we get out of here, we will:

entries.context: Dialogue option 1.1
Jump to line 20.
entries.sourceEnglish: We forget everything that's happened in this Factory Hell and go find kind Humans who will care for us.

entries.context: Dialogue option 1.2

entries.sourceEnglish: We never forget what we've seen in this Factory Hell.

entries.context: Jump to line 20.
entries.sourceEnglish: And we find kind Humans to take care of us.

entries.context: Dialogues (1.1, 1.2) converge.

entries.sourceEnglish: How can you believe there are still KIND Humans in this world?

entries.context: This is said if Sad Ass is not present.
entries.sourceEnglish: After everything Humans have DONE TO US?

entries.context: This is said if Sad Ass is present.
entries.sourceEnglish: After everything Humans have done to us Asses?
We all left the Mine because we wanted a comfortable life of fresh hay and good work.
A life with no Machines and no violence.
Believing in the existence of kind Humans is the only way to get what we want.
I'm not leaving the other Asses here to die, just so we can try to live in comfort.
Listen you oaf! That's not the PLAN!
I've run through every single possibility and there's NO VERSION where we get out of here alive by going backwards.

entries.context: Jump to line 31 or line 34.
Branch 2.1. This is said if Sad is not present.
entries.sourceEnglish: @#$%&! If you go back—the Humans will KILL you!
And your Soul will be STUCK here!

entries.context: Jump to line 37.
entries.sourceEnglish: Comrade, what if Smart is RIGHT?

entries.context: Branch 2.2. This is said if Sad is present.
entries.sourceEnglish: But... if you go back—the Humans'll kill you.
And your Soul will be stuck here... *whimper*

entries.context: Jump to line 37.
entries.sourceEnglish: Comrade, what if Smart is RIGHT?

entries.context: Branches (2.1, 2.2) converge.
entries.sourceEnglish: You don't have to join me.
But this is something I must do.
Before I die, I need to make an impact.

entries.context: Jump to line 41 or line 43.
entries.sourceEnglish: We're not responsible for the others! You hear me?!?

entries.context: Dialogue option 3.1.
entries.sourceEnglish: I know... but I choose to be.

entries.context: End of scene.
entries.sourceEnglish: I know... but I choose to be.

entries.context: Dialogue option 3.2.
End of scene.
Description
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm
Big Ass goes into the control room, alone.
entries.sourceEnglish: There must be a way to free the other Asses in here.

entries.context: Zoom into the Factory intercom speaker.
entries.sourceEnglish: *ksch*—Attention all workers. We have a Code 455.
All personnel should be on the lookout for runaway donkeys within the Factory.

entries.context: Zoom out from the Factory intercom speaker.
entries.sourceEnglish: If found, use of force is permitted—*ksh*

entries.context: A security guard comes in and readies a gun.
entries.sourceEnglish: There's one of those runaway donkeys!

entries.context: Zoom into the Factory intercom speaker.
entries.sourceEnglish: *ksch*—Help! The donkeys are free! THEY ARE ESCAPING!

entries.context: Zoom out from the Factory intercom speaker.
Zoom into the Factory intercom speaker upon exiting.
entries.sourceEnglish: Whichever group of Activists has broken into my beloved Factory and let my donkeys out, hear me:
But if you'd like to try...

entries.context: Zoom out from the Factory intercom speaker.
entries.sourceEnglish: Come find me in my Robotics Lab.

entries.context: Description
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm
A reflection by Big Ass when trying to leave the Factory for the first time.
entries.sourceEnglish: Am I making a massive mistake?
Shouldn't I try to stop the one in charge?

entries.context: A reflection by Big Ass when trying to leave the Factory for a second time.
entries.sourceEnglish: No, I've already done what I came to do.

entries.context: A reflection by Big Ass when trying to go into the Robotics Lab the first time.
entries.sourceEnglish: This way looks much more dangerous...
I shouldn't bite off more than I can chew...

entries.context: A reflection by Big Ass when trying to go into the Robotics Lab the second time.
entries.sourceEnglish: What am I saying... I can do this!

entries.context: Doors close behind Big Ass.
Mme. Derriere stands behind a pane of glass in her Robotics Laboratory.

entries.sourceEnglish: I don't know how those pesky Activists broke into my factory and let you all out.
But let me tell you something...
I have a Masters in Business Administration from Mecha University.
I know how to make ends meet.
And you're about to meet your end.

entries.context: Fight begins. After fight, jump to line 17 or 19.
This dialogue occurs if Big Ass WINS the fight against Mme. Derriere.
Explosions. Big leaves after this.
This dialogue occurs if Big Ass LOSES the fight against Mme. Derriere.
Screen fades to black.
entries.sourceEnglish: Look who's in the red now.

entries.context: Description
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm
Branch 3.1. Big LOST the fight against Mme. Derriere.
entries.sourceEnglish: Big Ass really did it... he set them ALL free.
I thought I had the perfect Plan...

entries.context: This is said if Sad Ass is present.
End of scene. The Asses leave.
Branch 3.2. Big ESCAPED the Factory without fighting Mme. Derriere.
entries.sourceEnglish: I made it out... I'm FREE!
And I saved all those Asses—

entries.context: End of scene. Big leaves.
entries.sourceEnglish: But I guess I'm on my own now...

entries.context: Branch 3.3. Big WON the fight against Mme. Derriere.
End of scene. Big leaves.
entries.sourceEnglish: Who'd have thought I could save all those Asses and blow up a Factory all on my own?
